Question: 1 (a)
Guide:
$$\begin{aligned}\bar{x} \pm 2 \frac{s}{\sqrt{n}} &= 2.3 \pm 2 \frac{1.2}{\sqrt{53}}\\\\ & = 2.3 \pm 0.33\\\\ & = (1.97, 2.63)\end{aligned}$$
 - 1 mark for calculation
 - 1 mark for answer
 - 1 mark for interpretation
